channel.title: Help Again :D
channel.description:
How do I change the way my NPC faces. And can i have the template for how the NPC code goes in autospawn.cgf?
Heres the code i want
like //spawn - npc id - ????? - ??????? - ?????? - ???????? - ??????? - ????? - ?????? - ????? spawn = 2862 3092 3504 0 0 0 0 0 2
if you get what i mean like a lable to what the number is

item.title: Help Again :D
item.dc:creator: @dillingo dillingo
item.description:
@dillingo wrote:

Template is
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

I’m not sure how to change their direction, use the search bar.

Read full topic
